plot: John analyzes the right wing media's protests, conspiracy theories and misinformation spreading about the pandemic, spotlights Inside Edition's latest 'coming up' segments, and becomes a fan of the home edition of The Wendy Williams Show.

John presented the latest installment on Corona Virus. He talks about how misinformation is hurting the entire population even the people who are trying to do the right things. The disinformation and wrong facts provided by few media outlet is putting all the others in imminent danger. And the leadership is no good place to go as the leader himself believes the misinformation and loves to spread it around. That is why the situation has became more frustrating and protest against Stay at Home order has began.—Niaz Islam Arif

Last Week Tonight continues its coverage of the COVID-19 pandemic. John Oliver examines the growing problem of misinformation about the disease and discusses how televangelists, the right wing media, and President Trump has contributed to the public's misunderstanding of the disease.—Shatterdaymorn
